channel.title: Intro to the workshop on Nginx Experience
channel.description: Recent content in Intro to the workshop on Nginx Experience

item.title: AWS Workshop environment
item.description: There are two ways of doing the workshop, as part of an AWS event or on your own. Please click the relevant path. AWS Workshop On your own

item.title: Cloud 9
item.description: Open the Cloud9 console, and click on Open IDE. This will open a cloud-based integrated development environment (IDE) that lets you write, run, and debug your code with just a browser. It includes a code editor, debugger, and a terminal. We will be using it for the rest of the workshop. Ad blockers, javascript disablers, and tracking blockers should be disabled for the cloud9 domain, or connecting to the workspace might be impacted.
